result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Preston R. Lee in court with attorney Thomas Lee Steinman.  Jake A Westman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  STATE DISMISS & READ IN.  COURT DISMISS & READ IN.

Defendant Preston R. Lee in court with attorney Thomas Lee Steinman.  Jake A Westman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  STEINMAN:  Stand mute to all counts.  JUDGE:  Enter NG plea to Ct.1-4.  Bond cont'd  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Not to use, possess, or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription .   No drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Preston R. Lee in court with attorney Thomas L. Steinman.  Defendant in custody.  Jake A Westman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  STATE:  Not object to sig bond.  STEIMAN:  Waive prelim. - file Waiver of Prelim today.  JUDGE:  $2500.00 Sig Bond.    Not to use, possess, or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription .   No drug paraphernalia.  DEF:  Give up right to prelim hearing.  JUDGE:  Waive prelim hearing.  Probable cause found.  Bound over to Circuit Court.  STATE:  Information filed today.    Schedule arrnmnt  Arraignment scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Preston R. Lee in court with attorney Thomas L. Steinman.  Sarah Kenas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   JUDGE REVIEWS CHARGES/PENALTIES WITH DEFENDANT. REQUEST PRELIM W/10 DAYS  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 13, 2015 at 10:00 am.
PETITION FOR LEAVE TO FILE ADDITIONAL MOTIONS - T. STEINMAN
Initial appearance on March 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Not to use, possess, or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription .   No drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Preston R. Lee in court VIA VIDEO, in custody.  Jake A Westman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   JUDGE REVIEWS CHARGES/PENALTIES WITH DEFENDANT.  PUBLIC DEFENDER NOTICE GIVEN TO DEFENDANT. STATE - $2500 CASH BOND -   Not to use, possess, or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription .
